Q_DESC:
Create a class called square with one data member named side(int). Include 4 functions in the class namely getSide(),setSide(),calculateArea() and calculatePerimeter(). Refer class template for further details on functions.
In the main function, create an object of circle class and invoke the 4 methods.

Input:-
 Enter the side of the square 
Output:-
1st line is The area of the square .
2nd line is The perimeter of the square is
3rd Line The area of cube
